name: Speed Formula: Car Racing
description:
Speed Formula: Car Racing is a car games but you are fortunate to find a racer game of such quality. Racing experience with formula racing legend will not only bring you joy but you will also invite the crew you belong to, to play multiplayer racing games with mobils. Top new car speed Is Drift based drag simulation for Sick lover of racing action games. Drive your car on highway in city racing and feel like a driver with no limits. One of the best in car racing games with applied physics & real time race.
Features
- Adorable HD graphics.
- Stunning 3D environment.
- Smooth racing track.
- Beautiful animations.
- Easily car control system.
- Mind blowing game play control.
- Ultra sound system quality.
- Booster racing technology.
